location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 5393/43 'Vesey Fitzgerald, Locust officer in Arabia'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 7; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence regarding arrangements for sending post to Vesey Fitzgerald, an officer for the Anti-Locust Research Centre based in Arabia. The correspondents are the India Office and the Colonial Office.
